storyInfo:
With Aurora's help, a captive Ensia decides to seek out her sister.
In the hall of Karlan, Enya confronts the Great Elder, and wins her future for herself.

attributes.content: Why can't I go out, Uncle?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: By the president's orders, you are not to go running around until he returns.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: So when's he coming back?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: The president is currently making his way to Karlan, and will be back in two days' time.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Look, I just want to catch a breath of fresh air, okay?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: If you'll stay around the estate... I'll send someone to follow you.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Ensia, this is for your own good. The situation in Kjerag is precarious right now.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: *Sigh*...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Do you really need to do all this... Enciodes?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Doctor, what should I do...?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Aurora?!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Shhh–– Keep it down, it was really hard for me to sneak in with all the guards.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Weren't you and Sharp going to stay with the Doctor?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Yes. I'm here because the Doctor wanted me to tell you something.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: You're absolutely sure?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Yes, Arctosz has assembled a large number of soldiers in his territory, but he's not the one leading them – the Doctor is.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Where's Arctosz?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: I'm not sure... From eyewitness accounts, he disappeared after formally handing leadership of his forces to the Doctor.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: Is that Doctor's squad the bait? No, it can't be that simple.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: How about their numbers?
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: The Paleroche clansmen who responded to Arctosz's call were mostly what you expected. Based on our estimates, Arctosz shouldn't have enough men to assemble another squad.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: But there's no chance he's sitting in the back. There's a high possibility of there being another team.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: The Paleroche clan's warriors are skilled at operating in the mountains. It's not beyond the realm of possibility.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: They can't leave this squad alone though, regardless of whether it's a decoy or the main force.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Let Weiss pass on the orders and have the troops gather at the base of the mountain, awaiting further instructions.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: Then dispatch someone to keep track of the army. Your primary responsibility is to find Arctosz.
attributes.name: Gnosis

attributes.content: On it.
attributes.name: Monch

attributes.content: The Doctor... wants me to climb up the mountain and sneak into the Vine-Bear Court to find my sister?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Correct.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Because conflict between the Paleroche and Silverash clans is almost unavoidable now.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: But if there's one person who can put a stop to all of this, it's your sister, the Saintess, Enya Silverash.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: But... But...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: The Doctor wanted to stick to Rhodes Island's policy of nonintervention and stand by.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: But since restoring the Saintess to power was just a ploy by Mr. Enciodes, the Doctor believes he doesn't care much for Kjerag's faith.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: And once the Silverash clan's forces beat down the Paleroche clan's, the only thing stopping him from taking all of Kjerag is the Vine-Bear Court.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: In other words, the object of faith for all the people of Kjerag – the Saintess.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: The Doctor doesn't actually need you to convince the Saintess to do anything. The basic idea is there might be a way to heal the relationship between your brother and sister.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: There might also be some guilt in there for not being able to help since coming to Kjerag.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: I'd never blame the Doctor for that! I just want to apologize, both to the Doctor and everyone else who came with me. This was supposed to be a nice vacation, but my brother went and screwed everything up...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: It's not your fault either, Cliffheart.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Anyway, the Doctor's been dragged into Enciodes's business, and can't stand on the sidelines anymore.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: And anyway, you're Enciodes's sister. Nothing can change that.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: So the Doctor's decided to make a move.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: And it's to have you go up the mountain, and become a kind of insurance beside the Saintess.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: The Doctor wants me to stop my brother's plans when the time comes.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Or, take the Saintess and run when the time comes.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Ensia subconsciously rubs the coil of rope in her hand.
Her sister braided it for her when she was a child.
I'll go.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: This is a covert operation. I'll be there with the other operators to help.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: I have a better idea.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Just get me to the base of Mount Karlan. I'll handle the rest myself.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Doctor, why are you marching us at such a slow pace?
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.options: So as to give those prying eyes their fill.;We can

attributes.content: Gulo, don't tell me you still haven't figured out what we're doing?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Aren't we drawing the attention of the Silverash clan? I think we're going a bit too slow for that.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: I see you're eager to just rush in and fight the Silverashes.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Sure am.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Last time, Valais handed me my ass, so I've got a chip on my shoulder.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Doctor, we've confirmed the location of Yucatan, who was taken away during the ceremony.
attributes.name: Paleroche Clan Warrior

attributes.content: As you suspected, she was not taken to the Silverash clan's territory, but locked up at the base of the mountain.
attributes.name: Paleroche Clan Warrior

attributes.content: Doctor, you really are something else. You managed to find Old Yucatan this quickly.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Hmph. Such simple intelligence gathering is child's play for a Browntail.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Anyway, we've found Yucatan, so it's time for me and this idiot here to get moving, right?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: What's with the silent treatment?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: What, were you talking to me? I don't remember my folks ever calling me 'Idiot.'
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: (Sighs deeply)
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: General! Gulo! Hmph... You happy now?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: I'm asking you, do you know what you're supposed to be doing?
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Of course. Head to the nearest station, cause some chaos, and give you a chance to rescue your man.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Good.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: But a word of warning from the Doctor –– don't actually kill anyone.
attributes.name: Sciurus

attributes.content: Hmph. The station's full of civilians. I swear on my name not to lay a finger on them.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: But, Doctor, if the Silverashes show up...
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: All I can say is, I'll try to hold back.
attributes.name: Gulo

attributes.content: Cliffheart, did you say you were looking for... your mountaineering equipment?
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Yup.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Don't tell me you're going to climb Mount Karlan...
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Eh... From what you've told me, there should be a ton of people in Karlan.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: If we're talking about heading up the face of the mountain, even the squad leader would have some difficulty sneaking in.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: But that's nothing I can't handle~
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: As long as you can get me to the foot of the mountain, I can handle the rest.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: But... the others and I won't be able to protect you.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: No biggie, no biggie.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I've gotten plenty of training at Rhodes Island, so I'm more than capable of handling myself in an ordinary fight.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: But...
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: Ensia, where are you going?
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Uncle Chester...
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I want to go climbing.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Which mountain are we talking here?
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Mount Karlan.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: That place is going to turn into a battlefield. You'll get hurt if you go.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Why do you want to go there?
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Uncle Chester, ever since I fell in love with mountaineering, I've always wanted to summit Mount Karlan with my own two hands.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: I've only wanted it even more since my sister left us and became the Saintess... One day, I would reach the peak and bring my sister home.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: And now, my chance has finally come.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: You won't be able to do that, Ensia.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Even if I can't bring my sister back home, I need to be with her at a time like this.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: She must be very confused after everything our brother's done.
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: If I can't stop him, then, I at least want to be there for her!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Olafur, your youngest daughter's gotten pretty big too.
Young Lady, I am sorry, but by the Master's orders, you are not allowed to leave the estate. It's for your own safety.
attributes.name: Silverash Clan Sergeant

attributes.content: Stand down.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Uncle Chester!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Sir, you're directly contradicting the Master's orders!
attributes.name: Silverash Clan Sergeant

attributes.content: I'll accept all responsibility for what happens here.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: But... Even if you'll go so far to vouch for her, how can that be more important than her safety?
attributes.name: Silverash Clan Sergeant

attributes.content: A Silverash never takes unnecessary risks.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: This time, let's trust her.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Ugh... Fine.
attributes.name: Silverash Clan Sergeant

attributes.content: Go, prepare a burdenbeast for the Young Lady and our guests from Rhodes Island.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Understood.
attributes.name: Silverash Clan Sergeant

attributes.content: Thank you, Uncle Chester!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Thank you very much, Sir.
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: I always thought you...
attributes.name: Aurora

attributes.content: No need to thank me.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Now go. Time is of the essence.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Okay!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Ensia.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Hm?
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Be careful out there.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Will do!
attributes.name: Ensia

attributes.content: Olafur.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Ever since you and Elizabeth passed on, I've always regretted that I stood against you and the reforms you tried to bring to our land. I should have stood with you.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: So, when your son decided to take up your ideals, I chose to support him wholeheartedly.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Enciodes has done exceptionally well.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: As the Saintess, Enya has won the adoration of the people of Kjerag.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: Though Ensia contracted Oripathy, her condition is under control and she is as happy-go-lucky as always.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: But, it suddenly just occurred to me.
attributes.name: Chester

attributes.content: How long has it been since I saw these three kids getting along, smiling and laughing as siblings should?
Great Elder, you still need to rest...
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: According to the records, this great hall was built by the people of all three clans following the establishment of the Tri-Clan Council. The existence and cooperation of the three clans far predates the modern Tri-Clan system.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Then, after thousands of years passed, the system was tweaked and sanded down, until it became what we see today.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: And this chair may well have been here for thousands of years.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Over a dozen Great Elders sat on this seat, spending their lives here.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Juast as a dozen Saintesses found their final resting spot atop this mountain.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: From the very beginning, the Saintess was a fabrication of the Vine-Bear Court to facilitate the spread of the faith.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Now that you've chosen to tell me these things I've known for a long time, are you meaning to say that our faith is false?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: You seem to be a lot more direct as well. But I mean the opposite, Enya. Sorry, Saintess.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Saintess... *cough* *cough*... Do you know my original name?
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: I'm afraid no one in the present Vine-Bear Court remembers either.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Even I, myself, have forgotten.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Each Great Elder, after taking up the mantle of the previous one, is known only as 'Great Elder'.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: One day, the people will also forget your name, and know you only as 'Saintess'.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Then, the Great Elder and Saintess come to realize––
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: What people believe in... is not Kjeragandr.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: People can believe in anything, as long as there's a story, a few neat coincidences. They will believe in you, in me, in Enciodes, in the mountain, in the water, even in a single leaf.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: If people can believe in anything, then what is faith?
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: The Great Elders finally came to an answer:
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: What people believe is faith itself.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: People choose to vest power in the object of their faith.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: People attribute the things that they shun to their faith.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: People unconditionally trust the way of life to which their faith guides them.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: So, what is faith?
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Faith is laziness, escapism, and decadence! Faith is stability, faith is stagnation! *cough* *cough* *cough*––
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Let's get you to bed, Great Elder.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: No, Saintess. Saintess!
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: The Great Elder desperately clutches at Enya's wrist.
His grasp is so tight that it leaves a red mark on her skin, as if he spent all his remaining strength on it.
His eyes are fixed on the Saintess before him, but he seems to be looking at someone else.
Faith is ugly! But even so, it is indestructible!
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: In the thousands of years of Kjerag's history, the cracks between the three major clans have gradually widened, yet no one can deny faith. Faith is the foundation of Kjerag!
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Faith unites the people of Kjerag. People seek out faith, people rely on faith!
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Kjerag has existed like this for thousands of years!
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: The people crave stability! The people crave stagnation!
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Enciodes thinks he has won, but he hasn't. He cannot win.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: How could he possibly defeat the faith that has coalesced in Kjerag for millennia?
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: This old man is about to die, but you are still young. You are the Saintess of this Vine-Bear Court, and you will become the Great Elder of this Vine-Bear Court.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Go forth and instruct him, overcome him. Make him understand that in the face of faith itself, his actions are insignificant, beneath even mention!
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Enya remains silent for a while, but forces herself free of the Great Elder's grip.
She feels pity for the old man before her, but she feels a greater determination.
...I disagree, Great Elder.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: You say that faith equals stagnation, and that people depend on faith because they demand stability.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: But that's not how I see things.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: It is true that once people accept a faith, they come to rely on it. Laziness, escapism, decadence... I can't argue those.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: But this does not mean that faith itself is stagnation.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Faith is just faith, nothing more. It has no attributes by itself, and its substance comes from what is put into it.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: If the faith progresses, then the faithful will progress with it.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: If the faith stagnates, then the faithful will stagnate with it.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: The reason why you think the people of Kjerag crave stagnation is precisely because Kjeragandr's faith has been stagnant for thousands of years in the hands of the Vine-Bear Court!
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: We've drawn up this land as a prison to preserve the rules of some ancient agreement, surviving in these snow-capped mountains for millennia without exploring or even making contact with the outside world.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: And you mean to tell me this agreement has anything to do with our faith?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Is it not just the arrogance of the Vine-Bear Court?
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Arrogance? No, no, this is how things were meant to be!
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Nothing is inherently meant to be.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: If it seems that way, it's only because it's never been changed.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: It's time to change, Great Elder.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: No, Saintess, you cannot change anything.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: Faith... *cough* *cough*... is the fundamental reason why Kjerag is Kjerag.
attributes.name: Great Elder

attributes.content: I will go and face Enciodes, but not in the way you want.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I don't know if I'll succeed.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: But, since the Saintess has always been used by the Vine-Bear Court as a tool to guide the peoples' faith...
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I shall put this tool to good use.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I am the Saintess, but I am not the Saintess of the Vine-Bear Court. I am the Saintess of Kjerag.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: I will use my own methods to guide the people to freedom. The freedom to progress, to explore, to take risks.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: And as for you, Great Elder, it is time to rest.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Attendants, come help the Great Elder away.
attributes.name: Enya

attributes.content: Enya stands up and walks to the door of the great hall, her eyes fixed forward.
Behind her, the Great Elder occupies his same seat, watching her back grow ever smaller in the distance. He stretches out his hand as to grasp something, but finally, powerlessly, it drops.
He grasps nothing at all.
He remains there evermore, motionless, just like the snow of Kjerag blanketing his dreams.
